## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I'm really interested in creating my own tokens or blockchains. What capabilities does Verus offer to users who want to create their own tokens or blockchains?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus is a great platform for that. Verus enables users to create their own tokens or full-fledged blockchains without requiring programming knowledge. These blockchains can be multi-currency, ID-issuing, and 51% hash attack resistant, and can interact with the Verus chain that launched them. You can create your own blockchain ecosystem with Verus, which is really powerful. Do you have any questions about how to get started with creating your own blockchain on Verus?

**User:**
That sounds amazing. I've heard of PBaaS chains. How do PBaaS chains benefit from being part of the Verus network?

**AI Assistant:**
PBaaS chains can benefit from being part of the Verus network in several ways. By joining the Verus network, PBaaS chains can inherit a complete, multi-currency, ID-capable blockchain with DeFi capabilities that is merge-mineable and stakeable with other blockchains in the Verus network. Additionally, projects can join the worldwide Verus community in improving the daemon, contributing to the development of the network. This allows PBaaS chains to tap into the collective resources and expertise of the Verus community. Does that make sense? Do you have any other questions about PBaaS chains on Verus?

**User:**
I've also heard about Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies. Can you explain what they are and how they address common DeFi issues?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies are a innovative solution that allows ID owners to define currencies with one or more asset currencies backing the liquidity pool at a fractional percentage. This ensures that all currency conversions using a particular liquidity pool and mined into one block are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing problems such as miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running. The Verus DeFi protocol also provides fee-based DeFi integrated incentives to miners and stakers, ensuring smooth consensus operation and fee conversion capabilities. This design solves many of the issues that plague traditional DeFi systems. Do you have any other questions about Verus DeFi or fractional basket currencies?
What capabilities does Verus offer to users who want to create their own tokens or blockchains?

Verus enables users to create their own tokens or full-fledged blockchains without requiring programming knowledge. These blockchains can be multi-currency, ID-issuing, and 51% hash attack resistant, and can interact with the Verus chain that launched them.

nted on non-Verus systems.
## Multi-currency, user created, decentralized tokens and merge-mineable, interoperable blockchains without programming
- Enables any user with an ID to create their own token currency or even full fledged, multi-currency, ID-issuing 50% POW/50% POS, 51% hash attack resistant blockchain that can send and receive from the Verus chain which launched it. All PBaaS chains run from the same daemon, and projects may choose to join the worldwide Verus community in improving the daemon. In doing so, they will start with a complete, multi-currency, ID-capable blockchain with DeFi capabilities that is merge-mineable and stakeable with other blockchains in the Verus network.
## Consensus integrated DeFi liquidity pools and fractional currency baskets
- Any ID owner may define Verus DeFi fractional basket currencies with one or more asset currencies backing the liquidity pool at a fractional percentage ranging from 5% to 100% backing. The Verus DeFi protocol ensures that all currency conversions that use a particular liquidity pool and are mined into one block are solved and priced simultaneously, addressing the problems of miner extracted value (MEV) and front-running, while providing fee-based DeFi integrated incentives to miners and stakers, ensuring smooth consensus operation and fee conversion capabilities by integrating DeFi liquidity pools directly into the consensus and cross-chain bridge protocols.
## Simultaneous blockchain and blockchain liquidity pool launches
- Launch of a world class, worldwide, merge-mineable blockchain along with a fully decentralized or centralized “bridge” converter liquidity pool as part of defining a new blockchain. Bridge converter currencies have the same flexibility as other fractional 100% asset backed or partially asset backed currencies, but is bound to the launch of the new blockchain, runs on the new blockcha
